name: Substack
title: substack.com
shortDescription: Substack provides a platform for writers and creators to publish newsletters and earn from subscriptions. It's designed for independent journalists, bloggers, and anyone interested in sharing their thoughts directly with an audience. Users can monetize their content by setting up paid subscriptions, while maintaining full control over their mailing list and intellectual property.
pros: Ownership of mailing list and content
